name: 72 Maze (itch)
description:
This is our second maze-game prototype.

This time we've added 72 levels instead of just the one, a menu system, and a level selection system.

If you'd like to help us improve on our prototype and future reiterations, be sure to submit your valued feedback using the link below. 

>>>https://forms.gle/wgDuoew5yH9Gky1s8<<<

Follow our page for more updates on future projects!

-Thank you
